query.value:
@concat('SELECT srd_id,
	sd_reviewid,
	case when site = ''[대상]마켓컬리_STORE'' then ''마켓컬리_STORE'' else  site end  as site,
	site_id,
	replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_title, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_title,
    replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_content, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_content,
	srd_writer,
	srd_writetime,
	srd_rate,
	srd_crawl_time
	FROM ',
pipeline().parameters.SourceTable,
 ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = ','DATE(''', item().STARTDT, ''')')

@concat('SELECT srd_id,
	sd_reviewid,
	case when site = ''[대상]마켓컬리_STORE'' then ''마켓컬리_STORE'' else  site end  as site,
	site_id,
	replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_title, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_title,
    replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_content, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_content,
	srd_writer,
	srd_writetime,
	srd_rate,
	srd_crawl_time
	FROM ',
pipeline().parameters.SourceTable,
 ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY)')

@concat('SELECT srd_id,
	sd_reviewid,
	site,
	site_id,
	replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_title, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_title,
    replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_content, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_content,
	srd_writer,
	srd_writetime,
	srd_rate,
	srd_crawl_time
	FROM ',
pipeline().parameters.SourceTable,
 ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -',pipeline().parameters.date,' DAY)
 ')

@concat('SELECT srd_id,
	sd_reviewid,
	site,
	site_id,
	replace(replace(replace(srd_title,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂'') as srd_title,
    replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_content,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'','''') as srd_content,
	srd_writer,
	srd_writetime,
	srd_rate,
	srd_crawl_time
	FROM ',
pipeline().parameters.SourceTable,
 ' WHERE srd_content like ''병이 네모나서%''')

@concat('SELECT srd_id,
	sd_reviewid,
	site,
	site_id,
	replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_title, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_title,
    replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_content, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_content,
	srd_writer,
	srd_writetime,
	srd_rate,
	srd_crawl_time
	FROM ',
pipeline().parameters.SourceTable,
 ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') BETWEEN DATE(''2023-12-04'') AND DATE(''2023-12-05'') AND SITE =''마켓컬리_STORE''')
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT(DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ')) STARTDT FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' ORDER BY STARTDT')
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = ','DATE(''', item().STARTDT, ''')')
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY)')

select string_agg('{  "source": { "path": "['''||a.es_column_name||''']" }, "sink": {  "name": "'||a.pg_column_name||'", "type": "'||a.objtype||'" } }' ,',') as json
   from (
		  select a.es_column_name , a.pg_column_name , case when b.udt_name = 'numeric' then 'Decimal'
		                                                   else  'String'
		                                                end as objtype                                                                         
		    from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master as a inner join information_schema.columns b
		                                              on (
		                                                     a.pg_table_name||'_temp' = b.table_name
		                                                 and a.pg_column_name = b.column_name 
		                                                 and b.table_schema ='cd_ods'
		                                                 )       
		   where a.es_table_name ='@{pipeline().parameters.esName}'
		) a
